title: Min Max Seo
text: Welcome to my website. My name is Min (they/them) and I am a 4th-year undergraduate student at the University of Waterloo.

title: About
text:
I am a …

Math Enthusiast
“Math enthusiast” is the term I use to describe myself to my students. I hope to transfer my enthusiasm about math to them; my impression of math is transferable and can help students build positive associations with mathematics.


Classical Musician
I am a classically trained musician; I play the piano, viola, and flute. I am a violist of the University of Waterloo Orchestra. I hope to learn how to play the classical guitar as well.


Harm-Reduction Worker
I work as a harm-reduction worker at a local shelter in Waterloo, ON.


Researcher
My research interests include

Designing Accessible K-12 Mathematics Curriculum,
Reasoning & Decision-Making Processes in Mathematical Learning,
Examining the Roles of Self-esteem and Self-efficacy of Students in Learning Mathematics,
Teacher Education: Transferable Impressions of Mathematics, and
Supporting Students with Various Learning Needs in Mathematics Education.

This is not an exhaustive list.


Trans Activist
I am a racialized trans/non-binary person. Supporting and advocating for the trans community in various ways are essential parts of my life.
